# Load Libraries 
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(PNWColors)
```

# Load Data 

```{r ukraineplot, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
FreeData<-read_csv(here("2022-02-22","Data","freedom.csv")) %>% 
  filter(country == "Ukraine")

ggplot(data = FreeData,
       aes(x = year))+
  geom_smooth(aes(y = CL, color = "Civil Liberties"))+
  geom_smooth(aes(y = PR, color = "Political Rights"))+
  labs(y = "Lack of freedom",
       x = "Year",
       color = "Legend",
       title = "Freedom Status of Ukraine since 1995")+
  scale_color_manual(values = pnw_palette("Moth"))+
  theme_classic()

 


```
